articles.description: Cook named four cricketers and only one from the modern era who he believed came close to the genius of Lara, who retired with 11953 runs in 131 Tests and 10505 runs in 299 ODIs.
articles.content: Former England captain Alastair Cook has played with some of the greatest batsmen of the modern era. Cook, who is himself regarded as one of England’s best Test batsmen, has played against the likes of Sachin Tendulkar, Brian Lara, Ricky Ponting, Rahul Dravid… [+2127 chars]

articles.title: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and MS Dhoni find place in Brad Hogg’s all-time IPL XI - SportsCafe
articles.description: Former Aussie cricketer Brad Hogg, on Sunday, named his all-time IPL XI and included the holy trinity of Rohit Sharma, Virat Kolhi and Dhoni, alongside both Bumrah and Pant. While Hogg’s side also featured Warner and de Villiers, veteran Suresh Raina was a no…

articles.title: Sania Mirza first Indian to win Fed Cup Heart Award - The Siasat Daily
articles.description: NEW DELHI: Tennis star Sania Mirza on Monday became the first Indian to win the Fed Cup Heart Award. Sania was the nominee for the award from the Asia/Oceania Zone alongwith Indonesia's Priska Madelyn Nugroho. "It's an honour to win the Fed Cup Heart Award as…
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Tennis star Sania Mirza on Monday became the first Indian to win the Fed Cup Heart Award. Sania was the nominee for the award from the Asia/Oceania Zone alongwith Indonesia’s Priska Madelyn Nugroho.
“It’s an honour to win the Fed Cup Heart Award a… [+1491 chars]

articles.description: MS Dhoni's mother came forward and said that her son is not that old after the veteran stumper's latest picture had gone viral on social media

articles.description: MS Dhoni has not played international cricket since the 2019 World Cup and was slated to return to the cricketing field during the 13th edition of the IPL.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Premier League restart gets boost as UK government sets June 1 date - ESPN India
articles.description: The Premier League has received the go-ahead from the United Kingdom government to resume behind closed doors no earlier than June 1.
articles.content: The Premier League could resume behind closed doors from June 1 after United Kingdom government set out a road map to emerge from coronavirus lockdown measures on Monday.The 50-page document, titled "Our Plan to Rebuild: The UK Government's COVID-19 Recovery … [+3102 chars]

articles.title: Nike’s Designer Reveals the Turmoil and Panic Michael Jordan Caused Due to His Retirement in 1993 - Essentially Sports

articles.content:

articles.author: Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘I’m your captain, don’t try to fool me’: When MS Dhoni scolded Mohammed Shami - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mohammed Shami, who made his debut under MS Dhoni, says the usually calm captain once told him off in strict words: "I have seen many players come and go, don't lie to me."
articles.content: MS Dhoni gave Mohammed Shami a strict talking-to on a tour of New Zealand in 2014, Shami revealed. (Screengrab)Mohammed Shami revealed that MS Dhoni had rebuked him in strong words on a tour of New Zealand in 2014, when the pacer had bowled a bouncer in frust… [+1991 chars]
